DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Efficacy TG-0054 With Single IV Doses Escalation Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female 18 45 year age inclusive Body mass index ( BMI ) range 19.0 30.0 kg/m² body weight ≥ 50 kg inclusive Good physical mental health status determine basis medical history general clinical examination Subjects must use consistent form acceptable oral birth control double barrier method ( intrauterine device ( IUD ) plus condom , spermicidal gel plus condom ) least 3 month prior study initiation Any medical condition ( selflimited illness ) require ongoing current medical attention History hematologic disorder include thromboembolic disease anemia Severe trauma , fracture , major surgery , biopsy parenchymal organ within past 3 month Any medical , psychiatric , social condition , occupational reason responsibility , judgment investigator , contraindication protocol participation impair volunteer 's ability give inform consent Subjects currently smoke ( intake nicotine nicotinecontaining product ) give smoke less 6 month first administration study drug Subjects carriers Hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) Hepatitis C antibody Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) antibody positive
